name: Disabled Volume Snapshots
description: Detects commands that temporarily turn off Volume Snapshots
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*reg* AND process.command_line:*\ add\ * AND process.command_line:*\\Services\\VSS\\Diag* AND process.command_line:*\/d\ Disabled*)`
